overview: When young American Ryan learns that his Finnish businessman father Kenneth has died and left him his fortune, he and his best friend Jerry are offered the chance to escape their troubles to the other side of the world - albeit to unpleasant childhood landscapes and memories. His new life gives Ryan the chance to learn more about his father's life's work - especially the mysterious Insite, a part of his inheritance that is being sought by businessman Derek  and his right-hand woman Ivy. Ryan is supported and protected by his father's former assistant Nita and coder Leo. With the inheritance comes new problems and old threats.
title: Insite
